name: Onet 3D - Matching Puzzle
description:
Onet 3D - Matching Puzzle is a Matching game with Well-designed challenging levels.

HOW TO PLAY?
1. Find two identical tiles, click to connect and destroy them.
2. Remove all tiles before the time is up.

FEATURES
- FREE TO PLAY !
- No WIFI-You can play it anytime, anywhere.
- Well-designed challenging levels.

Enjoy this puzzle game and challenge yourself!

----------
Ideas or suggestions? Just contact us at where2gogogogo@gmail.com.
Thanks for helping to make our game better!
